name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tower Building Offline Game for Google Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Tower Building Game offline version on your Google Chrome!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tower Building Game Offline Version (Less than 1MB)

Play Tower Building Game on your Google Chrome Browser. 

It's time to raise the stakes... and a tower, we suppose!
Time your taps to raise the highest of high-rises in this amazing building simulator.

Compete against your friends to see who's the best of the bunch on the high-score leaderboard!

Are you ready to build the tallest tower? Install now to enjoy this amazing arcade game brought to you

1. Install extension
2. Click the Tower Building Game icon on the Chrome extension toolbar 
and then we will open a Tower Building Game for you to play the game! You donâ€™t need to do anything else! You also can play Tower Building Game from any Chrome Tab.
Have fun!
